name: WeLock
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control welock with voice commands through your amazon echo devicces.For example, ask alexa to lock the door and unlock. the wifibox needs to be connected to the internet.
Try saying:
"Alexa, lock welock0"
"Alexa, unlock welock0"
We'd love to hear what you think. If you have any questions, please write to us at research@we-lock.com.

Welock's Bluetooth lock core and gateway are used together.
Users need to use the welock app account to link this skill.
